#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
long digsum(long n)
{long sum=n;
    while(n>0)
    {sum+=n%10;
        n/=10;
    }
return sum;
}
long retencore(long i,long n)
{for(i;i<n;i++)
if(digsum(i)==n)
return i;
return -1;
}
int main()
{int k;long n,i;
    //cout<<digsum(100);
    cin>>k;
    getchar();
while(k--)
{cin>>n;
if(n<100)
i=n-18;
else
if(n<1000)
i=n-27;
else
if(n<10000)
i=n-36;
else
i=n-45;
long tmp=retencore(i,n);
if(tmp!=-1)
cout<<tmp<<endl;
else
cout<<"NONE"<<endl;
}
return 0;
}
